author: sheila
post: Tickets are only 7.50! They’re not making money on it, just covering the costs of getting Russ Breault to the church. No advance ticket sales to put on credit card or such, so just get there if you’re close by! It’s a two hour presentation, btw. You can talk to David Witz by calling the number for the church. I’m so happy, I have the giggles!.
title: Russ Breault to Speak at First Baptist Church of Matthews

author: sheila
post: Sorry for you, Andy, but I’m saying “Yahoo! (not that one) and Yippy! Finally something within reach of where I live. (South Carolina) That’s super! Thanks Dan for posting this news. You’re a real champion!.
title: Russ Breault to Speak at First Baptist Church of Matthews
